resources.string: In this busy world People don\'t have time to go to restaurants and eat. Therefore, having an app as great as this makes yor life easier and tasty.
How many restaurants do you have?
We cover a large variety of restaurants located at your city and deliver delicious food at your doorsteps
Would my payment details secure on this app?
Your details are protected by google\'s Alpha security and hence cannot be breached. Thus, its a good reason to trust the app and its backend work.
We provide a bunch of payment options which does include Cash on dekivery and we are more happy to deliver food at your doorsteps and don\'t forget your satisfaction is our top priority.
